Package assegnamento3.src

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    Functional Interface that represents an action to be performed upon closure of a ConfirmationBox.
    Observer
    The Observer interface is used to implement the Observer Design Pattern.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Admin
    The class Admin represents an instance of an Admin of the WineShop.
    AdminController
    The class AdminController defines the controller for the admin.fxml.
    BasicAlertBox
    The class BasicAlertBox displays a basic popup in which title and message can be customized.
    BuyBox
    The class BuyBox defines the controller for the buy_popup.fxml.
    ClientHandler
    The class ClientHandler is responsible of managing the communication with each connected client.
    ConfirmationBox
    The class ConfirmationBox displays a popup with a custom message regarding an action the user can confirm or deny.
    Customer
    The Client class defines a Shop's Customer.
    CustomerController
    The class CustomerController defines the controller for the customer.fxml.
    DatabaseManager
    The class DatabaseManager handles the persistence of the data.
    HomeController
    The class HomeController defines the controller for the home.fxml.
    LoggableUser
    The LoggableUser class defines a generic person with log-in functionality.
    LoginRegisterController
    The class LoginRegisterController defines the controller for the log_reg.fxml.
    MainClient
    Main class for the client-side application.
    MainServer
    The class MainServer handles the main execution of the Wineshop Server.
    Message
    The class Message represents a user message.
    MessageBox
    The class MessageBox displays a popup with the inbox messages of a user (Customer or Seller) in a table.
    NetworkClient
    The class NetworkClient is responsible for establishing a connection to the server, sending requests, and receive responses.
    NetworkServer
    The class NetworkServer is responsible to create a persistent Server that accepts clients and creates instances of ClientHandler to handle them.
    Order
    The Order class represents a purchase order.
    OrderBox
    The class OrderBox displays a popup that allows a Seller to change details of an order.
    Parser
    The class Parser is a utility static class that handles the parsing of Users, Wines, and Orders received as text into actual Objects.
    Person
    The class Person defines a generic person described by a name and a surname.
    PortBox
    The class PortBox displays a popup that prompts the user for the server port.
    RefreshEvent
    The class RefreshEvent represents a refresh request.
    Request
    The class Request represents a serializable rpc-like request to be sent to the server.
    Response
    The class Response represents a serializable response of the server to a client's request.
    RestockBox
    The class RestockBox displays a popup that prompts the Seller for the amount of bottles of a wine to be restocked.
    Seller
    The Seller class defines a Shop's Employee.
    SellerBox
    The class RegistrationBox displays a popup that allows the registration of a new Seller or the modification of its data.
    SellerController
    The class SellerController defines the controller for seller.fxml
    SingleWineController
    The class SingleWineController defines the controller for the file wine.fxml
    Store
    The class Store manages the Wine Shop through methods that work on the inner data structures.
    Wine
    The Wine class defines the different kinds of wines.
    WineBox
